system.description: An invisible, mobile field surrounds you and prevents creatures from approaching you. You decide the field size (up to 10-ft. radius per level). Any creature within or entering must save (Will negates) or become unable to move toward you for the duration. Repelled creatures can fight others, cast spells, and use ranged attacks; if you move closer, they are not forced back but cannot voluntarily move closer. They can make melee attacks if you come within reach.

components.materialDescription: A pair of small iron bars attached to two small canine statuettes (one black, one white), worth 50 gp (arcane focus); divine focus (divine).

system.target: Up to 10-ft.-radius/level emanation centered on you
